original_text: If you change how you live, I will let you live in this place. It is the land that I gave to your ancestors, to be their home for ever.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 이 곳에 살게 하리니 곧 너희 조상에게 영원무궁토록 준 땅에니라

sentences.original_text: If you change how you live
I will let you live in this place
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 이곳에 살게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: that I gave to your ancestors
to be their home for ever
